channel.title: RuneSoul 317 24/7 - Fullscreen - Expert Coders - Awesome Website
channel.description:
[pre][img]http://img199.imageshack.us/img199/6841/vbulletin4logov.png[/img][/pre] Server features: -Auto character save (every 2 minutes) -24/7 Uptime -No Lag -Auto Vote System -Great Forums -Friendly Staff -Ancient Curses -Diffrent interfaces ( 377,474,508,525,562 ) -All skillcape emotes working (including dungeoneering) -100% duel arena -No duping -Dungeoneering and summoning! -Hits x10 ( can be turned on and off ) -Fullscreen Client -Auto Donator System -Forums and server are intergrated together. Create an ingame account and get a forum one vise versa. -Highscores (coming soon) -Players online on website (almost done implementing) __________________________________________________ _______________ Donator benefits: -Get killcount at gwd -Instant spellbook changing -Donator zone -Donator sign -Extra bosses and training areas __________________________________________________ _______________ Bosses: -Corporeal beast -GWD -KBD ____________________________________________________ More: - Overloads & Extremes - Re-sizable Client (Full-screen) - Summoning & Hunter - All Skills currently working - 600+ GameFrame - Vesta+Zuriels+Statius+Moriganns+Staff Of Light - Void+Elite Void - Korasi Spec Full working (Mage-based with same effect as runescape) - All SS's With working effects (Divine Spirit Shield reduces damage etc...) - Ring of Vigour increases special attack - Warrior Guild for Dragon Defender - Perfect PKing for a great experience - Bank Pins - and more features being added constantly! Application: I am in need of more coders, and graphic designers for the website as well as anyone who can do custom php work to help take some of the load off me. The server has a good amount of votes on websites and we can also use some people to help advertise, those who help advertise will get special items like donator pins etc. The set number of people I need is a dynamic number and I am looking for skilled and professional people to make a great server, that means that thirteen year olds that are just going to say to their friends oh yeah well I am a mod and I have so much power look at me need not apply. I run the server in a professional manner and that is a great assurance for the success of it. Unlike most server owners I know how to run a server, I know how to design websites as can be seen by our website (I do not want to violate forum rules but if you check moparscape vote site its easy to find), I also know Java and what not ofc the issue is I am just one person I have 2 coders atm but they do not have much time and I am looking for a coder(s) who can do pretty much it all or who can do more than just leech some code off a forum post. I will keep the application as easy as I can and you can apply for multiple positions if you want.
Application: Position apply for: How long have you been doing this skill: Age: Please give or explain some examples of what you have done relating to it: What will you bring to RuneSoul: Are you willing to take orders and not goof up on a power craze?: Do you have Skype, and a mic (not required but helpful): Anything else we should know?:
If you like me are sick of owners that are immature and just run around doing stupid things this is the server for you. We of course have fun but not at the expense of others and this is going to be a great stable server we just need the people to help us get there. To the trolls gtfo of this thread to everyone else I hope you enjoy what you have seen, remember this is just the start and tons of features are always being added. If you have any questions please feel free to ask (constructive only please), there is no minimum age on applying it is more about the maturity level of people, and yes I know this is RuneScape but there are mature people out their. I have the financial backing to make sure this server has time to succeed so to those thinking well I don't want to apply and then the server goes down the next day I wouldn't worry much about that. I want a great environment for everyone and all the help I can get is very much appreciated. Thanks for reading and enjoy! Pictures: [img]http://img849.imageshack.us/img849/2069/39594000.jpg[/img] [img]http://img828.imageshack.us/img828/1994/38665605.jpg[/img] [img]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/4413/39090207.jpg[/img] [img]http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/888/2ndone.png[/img] [img]http://img98.imageshack.us/img98/8426/archerstore.png[/img] [img]http://img231.imageshack.us/img231/6102/friendsignorecc.png[/img]

Are you willing to take orders and not goof up on a power craze?: I do whatever owner says, and be nice staff for players
Do you have Skype, and a mic (not required but helpful): I have skype and i have mic. Skype name is Shrawen
Anything else we should know?: I have over 5 years of RS experience and if i have some ideas in my mind ill tell you, i would really appreciate if you accept me to the team.

[quote=“kill you704, post:21, topic:414877”]Application:
Position apply for:Server Developer.
How long have you been doing this skill: I’ve been working with PI’s since 2009.
Age: 16.
Please give or explain some examples of what you have done relating to it: I have released over 15 server’s always having 25+ daily players. All these server were own’d by me. I have been working on a new project but once I saw this I’ll drop everything to come to you. I love your client and I’d love to work for you.
What will you bring to RuneSoul: Awesome Server codes. I can do anything you please. I can perfect skills or PvP.
Are you willing to take orders and not goof up on a power craze?: Yes Sir.
Do you have Skype, and a mic (not required but helpful): Yes. (both)
Anything else we should know?: I WOULD LOVE TO WORK FOR YOU! <3

Experiences - Check my Youtube Channel. In my Signature.[/quote]

item.title: RuneSoul 317 24/7 - Fullscreen - Expert Coders - Awesome Website
item.dc:creator: @runesoul runesoul
item.description:
@runesoul wrote:

we rushed god - Can you give me some examples of codes you have made, also send an email to admin@runesoul.com and we can talk more about you coding for the server. My main thing is seeing what the ability of coders are and of course building trust with them. If you could show some screenshots of work you have done etc that would be great.

Gizat - if you could give me some examples of your work you have done. I think you may be best suited for a moderator position but I need to know your timezone with that type of thing because we need more mods at the late hours well around 11 EST etc. I can’t say the website link on these forums but google RuneSoul and take a look at the website. First though if you could show some examples of code you have done or screenshots etc that would be nice to help the consideration.

[quote=“we rushed god, post:16, topic:414877”]Position apply for: Server Sided Coder
How long have you been doing this skill: Almost a year now
Age: 16
Please give or explain some examples of what you have done relating to it: I have made/ helped many 317s/PIs. 317/PIs are my by far FAVORITE server to edit. I love them. I have helped make helix-world, InnovationX and PwnXile. Some of todays top private servers.
What will you bring to RuneSoul: Anything and Everything server related!
Are you willing to take orders and not goof up on a power craze?: Ofc, as long as i can work at my pace (i don’t take long)
Do you have Skype, and a mic (not required but helpful): Yesss
Anything else we should know?: I do online school, so i can edit stuff + do school at same time.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: RuneSoul 317 24/7 - Fullscreen - Expert Coders - Awesome Website
item.dc:creator: @Gizcat Gizcat
item.description:
@Gizcat wrote:

Application:
Position apply for: Admin/Mod/Coder +Advertiser
How long have you been doing this skill: Coded a few servers before, know how to run them
Age: 14 (Mature for my age :p)
Please give or explain some examples of what you have done relating to it: Servers, PB Scripts, not much client sided work
What will you bring to RuneSoul: I put the “soul” in “RuneSoul”
JK but I will do my best to help it out.
Are you willing to take orders and not goof up on a power craze?: If I really wanted to screw around, I’d go somewhere else.
Do you have Skype, and a mic (not required but helpful): Yes to both, but something’s wrong with my mic.
Anything else we should know?:
-Pretty laidback but will get the work done
-Even though I’m 14 I’m responsible enough to work on a server.
-I
-I’m currently taking some of the hardest classes at my school, so I obviously will have to put that in front of RuneSoul

Please contact me via PM if I am accepted.

Thanks for considering me!

Read full topic
